repos.name: orchestrator
repos.description: A lightweight bash autonomous coding agents orchestrator.
repos.summary: A lightweight bash orchestrator that manages autonomous coding agents by routing tasks from a YAML database, spawning specialized agent profiles via CLI tools (claude, codex, opencode), and supporting dynamic task delegation with full tool access. Tasks persist in tasks.yml as the source of truth, with support for scheduling via cron jobs, skill management, and contextual execution tracking. The system uses structured prompts for routing, planning, execution, and optional review phases to coordinate multi-step autonomous work.

repos.name: skills
repos.description: A collection of independent, self-contained skills for AI agents.
repos.summary: A collection of independent, self-contained skills for AI agents that each include documentation and configuration via environment variables. Each skill can be installed across different agent platforms like Claude Code, Codex, and OpenClaw with a standardized setup process. Skills are security-reviewed, dependency-managed through setup scripts, and follow the Agent Skills open standard.

repos.name: claudio
repos.description: Personal clawdbot with memory, subagents, cron schedules, projects and configurations.

repos.name: homebrew-tap
repos.description: Homebrew tap for orchestrator

repos.name: meshbot
repos.description: Friendly bot that can autonomously handle tasks or delegate to its smarter friends.
repos.summary: Multi-agent orchestration framework that coordinates autonomous agents across workflows, with support for task delegation, scheduling, queuing, and channel integrations via Telegram and Discord. Routes work between specialized agents, handles retries and dead-letter queues, and enables dynamic agent creation based on task requirements. Built on pi libraries with isolated execution modes and extensible backend support for different agent implementations.

repos.name: smart-money-concepts
repos.description: A TypeScript implementation of Smart Money Concepts (SMC) / ICT methodology for market structure analysis. Detects order blocks, fair value gaps, breaks of structure, changes of character, liquidity grabs, and more.
repos.summary: A TypeScript library for detecting Smart Money Concepts (SMC) and ICT market structure patterns including order blocks, fair value gaps, and trend changes from OHLCV candle data. It provides real-time alerts and market state analysis with zero runtime dependencies, supporting both incremental updates and bulk backtesting. The library helps traders identify key technical structures like breaks of structure, changes of character, and liquidity levels for quantitative trading strategies.

repos.name: content-course
repos.description: Content Course landing page with Stripe & Solana payments
repos.summary: A landing page for selling digital courses that accepts both Stripe credit card payments and Solana cryptocurrency, built with Nuxt.js 3 and optimized for high conversion rates. It includes optional Supabase integration for managing course access and supports deployment to Vercel with configurable pricing strategies for each payment method.

repos.name: portfolio-guardian-saas
repos.description: Portfolio Guardian SaaS - Monitor your Solana portfolio 24/7 with AI-powered insights
repos.summary: A full-stack SaaS application built with Nuxt.js and Supabase that monitors Solana portfolios in real-time with AI-powered insights, P&L tracking, and automated alerts across multiple subscription tiers. It integrates with Solana RPC, Drift Protocol for perpetual positions, and supports Telegram notifications, OAuth authentication, and voice features via ElevenLabs and OpenAI Whisper. The platform is designed for deployment on Vercel and includes wallet management, portfolio analytics, and tiered pricing from free to enterprise plans.

repos.name: quant
repos.summary: A Python-based quantitative analysis and trading toolkit designed for financial modeling and algorithmic trading strategies. The project provides tools for backtesting, data analysis, and quantitative research workflows.

repos.name: mind
repos.description: mind palace / writing / notes

repos.name: bot
repos.summary: A TypeScript trading bot for cryptocurrency markets that supports multiple technical analysis strategies including SMA Crossover, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, SuperTrend, and Smart Money Concepts analysis. The framework provides real-time market data fetching via CCXT, candle streaming, signal generation, and trade execution across different exchanges and protocols. It uses a YAML configuration system and includes backtesting capabilities with a Justfile for command management.

repos.name: passive-trading
repos.summary: A cryptocurrency trading bot written in Python and Rust that operates on perpetual futures derivatives markets across multiple exchanges (Bybit, OKX, Binance, Hyperliquid, etc.), automatically placing and cancelling limit orders using a contrarian market-making strategy inspired by Martingale betting. It doubles down on losing positions through grid-based entries, employs trailing orders and forager features for dynamic market selection, and includes backtesting and optimization tools to refine trading configurations.

repos.name: trader-smith
repos.summary: An autonomous trading agent for Hyperliquid perpetual futures featuring modular architecture, advanced risk management, and real-time monitoring. Baby Smith v2.0 has been refactored into a modern codebase with full type safety and comprehensive error handling. The system is designed for sophisticated market-making strategies while maintaining multiple layers of risk controls.

repos.name: solana-vault-example
repos.description: A minimal Solana-based tokenized vault implementation that accepts user deposits, mints vault shares (ERC-4626 style), and enables authorized investment into third-party protocols via Cross-Program Invocation (CPI)
repos.summary: A minimal Solana-based tokenized vault that accepts user deposits, mints ERC-4626 style vault shares, and enables authorized protocol investments via Cross-Program Invocation. The system uses SPL Token for vault assets and Token-2022 for share tokens, with support for multiple protocol adapters to integrate with external DeFi protocols. Core operations include initializing vaults, depositing assets to mint shares based on exchange rate math, and routing vault capital to external protocols through CPI.

repos.name: private
repos.summary: A collection of utilities for managing privacy and backup operations. Provides command-line tools and scripts to help users securely handle data privacy concerns and maintain reliable backup systems.

repos.name: portfolio
repos.description: Portfolio Manager with multiple strategies with backtests, allocation checks + warning, suggestions for increase/decrease/exit/hedge positions. Deploy strategy using Docker. Built with rust with main focus execution on Solana, using Perps, borrow/lend and yield protocols.
repos.summary: A Rust-based portfolio manager that executes multiple trading strategies on Solana through perpetual futures, lending protocols, and yield farming with integrated backtesting, allocation monitoring, and position management suggestions. Provides risk warnings and rebalancing recommendations while supporting containerized deployment via Docker for automated strategy execution.

repos.name: home
repos.description: Home Containers
repos.summary: A collection of containerized services for a home server environment. This project manages and deploys multiple Docker containers to support various home automation and server functionality. It provides a containerized infrastructure solution for running services locally.

repos.name: lulo-cpi-example
repos.description: Lulo Example CPI Integration
repos.summary: A Solana smart contract program demonstrating user vaults that deposit and withdraw funds through the Lulo protocol via CPI (Cross-Program Invocation). Users can deposit to earn interest by transferring to Lulo, and withdraw either directly if sufficient balance exists or asynchronously through a Lulo withdrawal request. The example illustrates a pattern adaptable to protocol reserves where only admins manage deposits and withdrawals.

repos.name: bliv
repos.summary: A Solana-based DeFi protocol that optimizes yield farming and liquidity provision through smart contracts and a web interface. The project combines Anchor smart contracts deployed on Solana with a Next.js frontend, providing tools to liberate and maximize decentralized finance yields. It includes a local validator setup for development and testing with demo markets and a CLI for program interactions.

repos.name: bean
repos.description: Personal (or not) finance, accounting, defi/quant investments, projects and ideas.
repos.summary: A personal finance and quantitative investing project built on Beancount for plain text accounting, with infrastructure for importing financial transactions, analyzing portfolios, and implementing stock screening strategies across B3, Nasdaq, and Yahoo data sources. Combines ledger management, Jupyter notebooks for analysis, invoice generation, and personal knowledge management in a single repository with CI/CD workflows for automated price data updates.

repos.name: mev
repos.summary: A Rust-based starter template for building MEV bots on Solana that handles boilerplate setup for Jito searcher and geyser protobufs. It includes a reference implementation of a backrun arbitrage bot that identifies profitable trades in the mempool, calculates arbitrage routes across DEXs like Raydium and Orca, and executes backrun transactions through Jito bundles. The template pins dependencies to Solana 1.14.13 for consistency and allows developers to add custom bot implementations into the workspace structure.

repos.name: defi-automator
repos.description: Manage your DeFi like a quant fund
repos.summary: CLI tool for automating DeFi portfolio management on Solana's Orca Whirlpools, enabling users to create concentrated liquidity positions using algorithmic strategies with automatic rebalancing and fee collection. Currently supports strategies like One Tick Lower and One Tick Upper, with plans to expand to additional protocols and chains.

repos.name: solana-nft-marketplace
repos.description: NFT marketplace contract on Solana
repos.summary: An NFT marketplace contract built on Solana using Anchor 0.18.2 from 2021 that enables users to list, update, and cancel NFT listings while supporting purchases with integrated marketplace fees and royalty payouts. The contract provides core marketplace functionality including price management and automated fee distribution to both the marketplace and NFT creators.

repos.name: classification
repos.summary: A Laravel-based system for classifying company attributes that uses an attribution classifier to automatically categorize and process company data, with comprehensive test coverage via PHPUnit.

repos.name: gabrielkoerich
repos.summary: A technical professional with 17+ years of software engineering experience, specializing in Rust and Solana smart contract development. Currently architecting DeFi protocols at Lulo and previously founded Bulldesk, a marketing automation SaaS acquired in 2021. Passionate about solving real-world problems in finance and building scalable systems.

repos.name: bulldesk-gridsome
repos.summary: A Gridsome starter project that combines Vue.js, GraphQL, and Bootstrap to generate static websites with built-in CMS integration via Forestry.io, Netlify forms, and Google Analytics. It provides a ready-to-deploy setup for content management through Markdown files stored in GitHub, designed for developers who want a powerful static site generator with minimal hosting costs. The project includes automated sitemap generation, Sass styling, and easy deployment through Netlify's CI/CD pipeline.

repos.name: granatum-php
repos.description: A PHP 7+ library for the Granatum API.
repos.summary: A PHP 7+ library that provides integration with the Granatum API for financial services. It enables developers to interact with Granatum's financial management platform programmatically through a native PHP interface.

repos.name: guidelines
repos.description: My PHP, HTML, CSS and Javascript guidelines.
repos.summary: Guidelines repository documenting coding standards for PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript projects, including PSR-2 compliance, indentation rules, and documentation conventions. Covers version control practices using GitHub Flow, commit message style, and language-specific best practices for different file types.

repos.name: dotfiles
repos.description: Gabriel's config files (zsh, tmux, git, etc) + backups, brew installs, coding agents and macOS setup.
repos.summary: Configuration management and macOS setup toolkit for Gabriel's development environment, including shell customization (zsh, tmux, neovim), app backup/restore via Mackup, and automated installation of coding agents and brew dependencies through Just command runner tasks.

repos.name: gabrielkoerich.github.io
repos.description: Projects & Work
repos.summary: Website code for http://projects.gabrielkoerich.com/.

repos.name: addressing
repos.description: Brazilian postalcode to address in a service manager.
repos.summary: A service that converts Brazilian postal codes (CEP) to full addresses. Provides a simple interface for looking up address information based on postal codes in Brazil.

repos.name: service-manager
repos.description: A simple way to run services in sequence.
repos.summary: A simple Node.js service manager that runs services in sequence. It provides a straightforward way to orchestrate and manage the execution order of multiple services. Licensed under MIT, it's designed for developers who need a lightweight solution for sequential service orchestration.

repos.name: algorit
repos.description: WIP
repos.summary: A web application combining a Vue.js frontend with Laravel Elixir, Sass, and Pug for styling and templating, paired with a PHP Lumen backend for API services. The project uses modern frontend tooling with Gulp for build automation while maintaining a lightweight PHP microframework approach on the server side.

repos.name: cashier-iugu
repos.description: Iugu integration for Laravel Cashier

repos.name: basedash
repos.summary: A Laravel-based web application framework that provides database management and system administration capabilities. The project includes a full development stack with Node.js asset building, database migrations, and comprehensive testing infrastructure using PHPUnit. It integrates frontend tools like Bower and Grunt for managing and building client-side assets.

repos.name: bovespa.io
repos.description: bovespa.io
repos.summary: A Laravel-based web application for financial data management with a frontend built using Node.js and Bower. The project includes database migrations, seeds, automated testing via PHPUnit, and a gulp-based build pipeline for asset compilation. Fundamentando provides tools for managing and analyzing stock market data through a full-stack PHP and JavaScript architecture.

repos.name: algorit.com.br
repos.summary: Website code for http://algorit.com.br.
